name: Stolen Throne - Crook of the Crown - Toro
brand: Stolen Throne, Crook of the Crown
additionalNotes: Based in Virginia, Stolen Throne was established by JR Cannon and Lee Marsh in 2019, the company's debut inaugurated by the Crook of the Crown cigar. Blended in collaboration with Texas-based cigar manufacturer and blender Noel Rojas, the Crook of the Crown is Stolen Throne's first release and flagship cigar, featuring a 10-year-aged Mexican San Andrés Maduro wrapper, an Indonesian binder, and Nicaraguan fillers. It offers a full-bodied smoking experience, replete with intersected notes of sweetness and spice, and is available here in Robusto size. Fillers are from Indonesia and Nicaragua. Full-bodied and Medium+ strength. Flavors are bold and balanced. Big notes of espresso, black pepper, and cream. The extra-aged wrapper adds sweetness and earth. Additional hints of leather, caramel, almond, and cocoa.
